items.sentence: I\'ll come to visit you at your house tomorrow.
Tom always eats something before going to work.
Tom always wants to be the center of attention.
Tom and I ate together in the school cafeteria.
Tom and Mary are as different as night and day.
Tom told me he\'d never tell anyone about that.
I was born in Boston, but I grew up in Chicago.
I was just hanging out with some of my friends.
I was surprised to hear that Tom had done that.
I was the one who convinced Tom not to do that.
